# (PART\*) PROGRAM {-}

# Program {.unnumbered}


```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)

opts <- options(knitr.kable.NA = "")

prog <- read_xlsx("./ForHer22_PROGRAM.xlsx") %>% 
  select(-7) %>% 
  mutate(event = if_else(str_detect(event, "S1-|S2-|S3-|S4-|S5-|S6-|S7-"), paste0("[", event, "](#", tolower(event), ")"), event))

```

## Monday: 18 April 2022 {.unnumbered}


```{r, echo=FALSE}
prog %>% 
  filter(!is.na(day)) %>%
  filter(day == "Monday 18/4") %>% 
  select(-day) %>% 
  kbl() %>%
  kable_paper("hover", full_width = T) %>% 
  column_spec(column = c(1,2), width = "100px") %>% 
  row_spec(row = 1, background = "#D6EAF8")

```
